---
title: "Schedule"
output: html_document
---
Hello

{{ partial "header.html" . }}

<main class="content" role="main">

  {{ if .Content }}
  <article class="article">
    {{ if .Title }}
    <h1 class="article-title">{{ .Title }}</h1>
    {{ end }}
    <div class="article-content">
      {{ .Content }}
    </div>
  </article>
  {{ end }}
  <div class="article">
    {{ $pages := .Pages }}
    {{ if .IsHome }}
    {{ $pages = .Site.RegularPages }}
    {{ end }}
    {{ range (where $pages "Section" "!=" "").GroupByDate "2006" }}
    <h2 class="article-title">{{ .Key }}</h2>
    {{ range .Pages }}
    <article class="article-item">
      <a href="{{ .RelPermalink }}" class="article-item-link">{{ .Title }}</a>
      <span class="article-item-date">
        {{ .Date.Format "2006-01-02" }}
      </span>
    </article>
    {{ end }}
    {{ end }}
  </div>

</main>
